BadgeDetail.Name: Initiative
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated that they can use their initiative. They can identify opportunities or issues that may be outside of their immediate responsibility, take appropriate action and communicate this appropriately.

Task.Title: Initiate
Task.Body: Describe a situation where you identified an issue outside of your usual area of responsibility and then took action to resolve it.
Task.HtmlBody: Describe a situation where you identified an issue outside of your usual area of responsibility and then took action to resolve it.
Task.TextileBody: Describe a situation where you identified an issue outside of your usual area of responsibility and then took action to resolve it.
